title: The Year Book of Education
additional-notes: This is originally a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Some volumes may be simultaneous UK and US publications.

Some volumes in this series may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such volumes are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Eli Baum for copyright research on this title.
